bibl.title: The Meaning of ἀνορμίζω and the Possible addendum lexicis ἀνορμέω.
bibl.note: The existence of *ἀνορμέω will need to be confirmed, and the entry in LSJ for ἀνορμίζω ought to be altered to read: moor [a ship] upstream or offshore. See pp. 38-39, for references to the papyri. <anormeo, anormizo>
bibl.seg: CONNOLLY Andrew, The Meaning of ἀνορμίζω and the Possible addendum lexicis ἀνορμέω.

The existence of *ἀνορμέω will need to be confirmed, and the entry in LSJ for ἀνορμίζω ought to be altered to read: moor [a ship] upstream or offshore. See pp. 38-39, for references to the papyri. <anormeo, anormizo>
